overview: The team that brought you such gonzo sensations as Filthy's First Taste and Filthy's Monster Cocks introduces a whole new series dedicated to those of us who bask in the dregs of sexuality. These scenes are scraped from a cutting room floor so sticky we had to hose it down to peel them off. Dirty girls, daring scenes, and dripping wet good times await you at every cut of the camera's eye.
title: Filthy's Dirty Cut
